5:30 PM

MEETING

Monday, November 14, 2022

TIME

5:30 PM

Mayor Sumbul Siddiqui

Nov 14, 2022

I. CITY MANAGER'S AGENDA
1. A communication transmitted from Yi-An Huang, City Manager, relative to a public health update.
CMA 2022 #224
RESULT:
PLACED ON FILE [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

2. A communication transmitted from Yi-An Huang, City Manager, relative to Climate Resilience
Zoning.
CMA 2022 #225
RESULT:
REFERRED TO THE HEALTH AND ENVIRONMENT COMMITTEE [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

3. A communication transmitted from Yi-An Huang, City Manager, relative to Awaiting Report Item
Number 22-72, regarding a report outlining the efficacy of the Private Property Rodent Control
Program and the SMART Digital Rodent Control Boxes, and any changes being contemplated to
these current programs; and the status of the Rat Liaison position.
CMA 2022 #226
RESULT:
PLACED ON FILE [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

4. Transmitting Communication from Yi-An Huang, City Manager, relative to the appropriation of
$586,000 from Free Cash to the General Fund Public Works Other Ordinary Maintenance account to
support the continuation and expansion the City’s rodent control program utilizing SMART box
technology and to fully fund the residential property rodent control program.
CMA 2022 #227
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui


PAGE 2

Nov 14, 2022

II. CALENDAR

CHARTER RIGHT
1. Policy Order Regarding Traffic Flow on Garden Street.
POR 2022 #282
Councillor Toner, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Carlone
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED AS AMENDED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor
McGovern, Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor
Zondervan, Mayor Siddiqui

ON THE TABLE
2. Policy Order Seeking Development Analysis
POR 2022 #267
Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor McGovern, Councillor Azeem
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED AS AMENDED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor
McGovern, Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor
Zondervan, Mayor Siddiqui


PAGE 3

Nov 14, 2022

UNFINISHED BUSINESS
3. That the Ordinance Committee refer Categories M (Shared Vehicle) and N (Publicly-accessible,
Privately-owned Electric Vehicle Charging System) of the Cambridge Transportation
Decarbonization and Congestion Mitigation Bill, along with definitions, to the full City Council
with a favorable recommendation. Ordinance #2022-13 as Amended
EXPIRED ON SEPTEMBER 27, 2022
POR 2022 #150
Councillor Zondervan
RESULT:
NO ACTION TAKEN

Next: 11/21/2022 5:30 PM

4. An Ordinance has been received from Diane P. LeBlanc City Clerk, relative to Reevaluation of
Housing Contribution Rate, Incentive Zoning Petition, Section 11.202 (d) of Article 11.000
entitled SPECIAL REGULATIONS, Ordinance #2022-18, as amended.
PASSED TO A SECOND READING IN COUNCIL OCTOBER 31, 2022
TO BE ORDAINED ON OR AFTER NOVEMBER 21, 2022
ORD 2022 # 18
RESULT:
NO ACTION TAKEN

PAGE 4

Next: 11/21/2022 5:30 PM

Nov 14, 2022

III. APPLICATIONS AND PETITIONS
1. An application was received from Daniel Brennan representing Life Alive Organic Cafe, requesting
permission for a projecting sign at the premises numbered 22 JFK Street approval has been received
from Inspectional Services, Department of Public Works, Community Development Department and
proof of abutters mailing has been provided.
APP 2022 #54
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

2. An application was received from Matt Hayes, requesting permission for a curb cut at the premises
numbered 55 Raymond Street; said petition has received approval from Inspectional Services, Traffic,
Parking and Transportation, Historical Commission and Public Works. No response has been
received from the neighborhood association.
APP 2022 #55
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui


PAGE 5

Nov 14, 2022

VI. POLICY ORDER AND RESOLUTION LIST
1. Improved Marketing for Green Plus Cambridge Community Electricity
POR 2022 #289
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Zondervan, Vice Mayor Mallon, Mayor Siddiqui
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED AS AMENDED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

2. That the City Manager be and hereby is requested to work with the appropriate departments to extend
the Outdoor Dining Policy and continue to allow winter outdoor dining as has been the case in the last
two years
POR 2022 #290
Councillor Zondervan
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

3. That the City Manager be and hereby is requested to work with the appropriate departments to
consider extending the current reduced fee schedule for another year.
POR 2022 #291
Councillor Toner, Vice Mayor Mallon, Mayor Siddiqui
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

Nov 14, 2022
